Question: Ceva, Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
CEVA, Inc.

Product: CEVA-XC20 DSP Architecture

- Features a novel vector multi-threaded compute technology for up to 2.5X power and area efficiency compared to its predecessor
- Highly scalable architecture targeting intense baseband compute use cases for 5G-Advanced eMBB devices, smartphones, and cellular RAN equipment
- Incorporates a groundbreaking Dynamic Vector Threading (DVT) scheme to address power, performance, and area constraints in 5G scenarios
- Designed in consultation with leading Tier 1 OEM customers to improve mobile network performance and power efficiency
- The first core based on the CEVA-XC20 architecture is the CEVA-XC22 DSP, offering a 2.5X improvement in efficiency for essential 5G use cases
- Availability: CEVA-XC22 DSP will be available for general licensing in the second quarter of this year

For further information, visit https://www.ceva-dsp.com/product/ceva-xc22/
Summary_cn:
CEVA公司

产品：CEVA-XC20 DSP架构

-采用一种新颖的向量多线程计算技术，相较于其前身，功耗和面积效率提高了2.5倍。
-高度可扩展的架构，针对5G高级eMBB设备，智能手机和蜂窝RAN设备的强烈基带计算使用情况。
-采用了突破性的动态向量多线程(DVT)方案，以解决5G场景中的功耗、性能和面积约束问题。
-与领先的一线OEM客户协商设计，以提高移动网络性能和功耗效率。
-基于CEVA-XC20架构的第一个核心是CEVA-XC22 DSP，为关键的5G使用情况提供了2.5倍的效率提升。
-可用性：CEVA-XC22 DSP将于今年第二季度正式发布。

获取更多信息，请访问https://www.ceva-dsp.com/product/ceva-xc22/
